item.name: cup tea
item.description: A cup has been set here.

extra_description.description: It is a small simple cup.

item.name: cup coffee
item.description: A cup has been set here.

extra_description.description: It is a small simple cup.

item.name: cup water
item.description: A cup has been set here.

extra_description.description: It is a large simple cup.

item.name: bottle water
item.description: A bottle of Evian natural spring water is here.

extra_description.description: You've been ripped off! It says here at the bottom of the label, in really really small letters, 'Bottled in the Midgaard branch of Evian Inc. This water is from the natural, mostly clean River of Midgaard.'
It is a large, clean bottle. There is a large label pasted on the side.

item.name: canteen water
item.description: A canteen has been set on the ground here.

extra_description.description: It is a fairly big canteen. Looks like it can hold a lot of liquid.

item.name: key iron
item.description: An iron key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The iron key is not special. In fact, it is quite boring.

item.name: key rusty
item.description: A rusty key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The key is a fairly large rusty key. You notice a lot of dirt it.

item.name: key wooden
item.description: A wooden key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The wooden key is not special. In fact it is just about the most boring key you've ever seen in your life.

item.name: key brass
item.description: A brass key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The brass key is small and looks like it fits a very complicated lock.

item.name: desk drawer
item.description: A desk is set against the western wall.

extra_description.description: The desk looks very sparse, there is a drawer in the left side.
You notice a keyhole in the drawer.

item.name: safe
item.description: A safe is placed in a dark corner of the room.

extra_description.description: The safe is very heavy and has a keyhole.

item.name: bench
item.description: A white-painted wooden bench is standing here.

extra_description.description: It is a quite heavy but very comfortable bench. It is placed with its front towards the river so you can sit and watch the river and the houses on the other side.

item.name: key city
item.description: The very big City Key is lying here.

extra_description.description: It is probably the biggest key you have seen in your life. It is made from polished gold and has various patterns on it along with the Midgaard Coat of Arms.

item.name: fountain water
item.description: A small white fountain is standing here, gurgling happily.

extra_description.description: It is very nice. Made from fine white marble.

item.name: coins gold
item.short_description: a small pile of gold coins
item.description: A small pile of gold coins lies here.

item.name: gold coins
item.description: A lot of gold is here.

item.name: candlestick candle stick pewter
item.description: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

extra_description.description: It is a rather old-looking three-armed candlestick made from pewter. Its candles are a yellowish white color.

item.name: tree elm
item.description: An old elm tree grows here.

extra_description.description: The fresh young leaves of the elm tree wave gently in the wind.
